isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Clock (Sleeper) W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper

svcproc.title: Clock (Sleeper) W/60 Inch Cantilever Sleeper
svcproc.para: Power flows from battery stud B2 through circuit 14AP, fuse F8 - D, circuit 14AX, 14P, 14N, fuse L2, and circuit 88A to the digital alarm clock. Circuit 88B also feeds power to the clock from circuit 88A. The ground circuit is 11F.
